name: Happy Moosey!!!
description:
This was technically the first game I created in GameMaker and released back sometime around early 2015.  (I think!) It was a silly game based on a friend's avatar at the Giant Bomb forums.

Press any key on your keyboard to play the game! Press Alt+Enter for Fullscreen.

Keep Moosey in the air! Don't crash into anything! This is the most unique and original videogame idea ever!  The difficulty of the game is much easier than the genuine article so you should be able to play for a while!
